Form Validation¶

Submodules¶

models.forms.validation module¶

models.forms.validation.validate_choicefield(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: ChoiceField (drop-down menu), value is not 0 (e.g. “Make a selection”)

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
models.forms.validation.validate_greaterthan0(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: Valid if value > 0

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
models.forms.validation.validate_greaterthanequalto1(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: Valid if value >= 1 (e.g. Mineau scaling factor)

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
models.forms.validation.validate_positive(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: Valid if value is positive (>= 0)

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
models.forms.validation.validate_range01(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: Valid range 0 - 1

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
models.forms.validation.validate_range0100(value)[source]¶

Form Validation Rule: Valid range 0 - 100 (e.g. temperature Centigrade/Celsius)

Parameters:value – Form input field value
Raises:ValidationError
